entity.name: gene
entity.query: select g.id, g.species_id, g.accession, g.gi, g.start, g.stop, g.strand, g.sys_name, g.name, g.description, g.chromosome_id from egrin2_django_gene g

entity.name: species
entity.query: select s.name, s.short_name from egrin2_django_species s where s.id = ${gene.species_id}

entity.name: network
entity.query: select n.name, n.version_id from egrin2_django_network n join egrin2_django_species s on n.species_id = s.id where s.id = ${gene.species_id}

entity.name: condition
entity.query: select distinct c.cond_name from egrin2_django_bicluster_conditions bicond join egrin2_django_condition c on bicond.condition_id = c.id join egrin2_django_bicluster bc on bc.id = bicond.bicluster_id join egrin2_django_bicluster_genes bigenes on bc.id = bigenes.bicluster_id join egrin2_django_gene g on bigenes.gene_id = g.id where g.id = ${gene.id}
